title: Beti Bachao Beti Padao (BBBP)
description: Launched in 2015, Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao (BBBP) is a government initiative in India that translates to "Save the Girl Child, Educate the Girl Child."

title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
description: This scheme provides financial assistance to eligible families for the construction or renovation of their pucca houses.
eligibility: Low-income families are categorized into four income groups (LIG, MIG-I, MIG-II, HIG)

title: Pradhan Mantri Matritva Vandana Yojana (PMMVY):
description: This maternity benefit scheme provides financial assistance to pregnant women and lactating mothers for a period of 1,000 days.
eligibility: Pregnant women for first live birth, belonging to low-income families.

title: Ayushman Bharat Yojana (ABY)
description: This health insurance scheme provides cashless and hospitalization cover to eligible families.
eligibility: Low-income families identified through Socio-Economic Caste Census (SECC) data.

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: This scheme provides LPG connections to eligible low-income families.
eligibility: Women belonging to Below Poverty Line (BPL) households.

title: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
description: This scheme provides skill development training to eligible youth to improve their employability.
eligibility: Youths between 15-35 years with varying educational backgrounds

title: Atal Pension Yojana(APY)
description: This voluntary pension scheme provides a pension to subscribers after the age of 60 years.
eligibility: Any citizen of India with Age 18-40 Years.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
description: Promoting financial inclusion, PMJDY offers basic savings bank accounts with no minimum balance requirement.
eligibility: Open to all, encouraging people to participate in the formal banking system.
